ComicInfo.Title: Episode 8: Kadath
ComicInfo.Summary:
An adaptation of H.P. Lovecraft’s The Dream-Quest of Unknown Kadath unlike anything you've read before. The Dreamer Randolph Carter’s quest comes to an epic conclusion when he meets one of the gods face to face. Will this encounter lead him to the place he has seen in his dreams, or back to the waking world? Will he live the rest of his days in a magical place beyond human comprehension, or lose it all back in his old life? As a bonus, also includes the original prose story!
